parameters.content:
## 1. Intake & Identification
Accepts the form submission and searches Airtable to identify the employee's department.

## 2. Routing
Splits traffic based on Dept.

## 3a. Engineering Onboarding Flow
Provisions access to GitHub, Engineering Slack channels, and assigns technical security training tasks.

## 3b. Marketing Onboarding Flow
Provisions access to Marketing Slack channels and assigns standard marketing orientation tasks.

## 4. Manager & Record Updates
Updates the employee record with the start date and manager link, then emails the manager.

parameters.formDescription: Hi, Welcome to AAT Enterprises. By now you should have gotten your company email if not please reach out to Duncan via email.
